Key Match Events: Aaron Judge misplayed a line drive, leading to a turning point in the game
The Yankees' bullpen faltered in the eighth inning
Alex Verdugo swung through a Walker Buehler knuckle curve to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed disappointment about the loss and the team's inability to win the World Series
The Yankees believed they had the talent to win the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Yankee Stadium
The Yankees finished the regular season with an AL-best 94 victories
Others: The Dodgers won the World Series in 2024
The Yankees' manager is Aaron Boone
